description: Turn data and spreadsheets like excel into interactive AI dashboards for every stakeholder. Breadcrumb helps you combine multiple data to understand whatâ€™s happening, and engage stakeholders.
title: Breadcrumb.ai - Engage with Data
keywords: Visualize Spreadsheets, Interactive Dashboards, Data Visualization, KPIs, Business Review
introduction: Breadcrumb is an AI-powered end-to-end analytics platform designed for everyone. It embeds the latest intelligence into every aspect of the analytics process, allowing non-technical users to understand and communicate interactive insights.
features: Share via public link or custom report
Combine up to 10 sources per space
Priority access to new features and updates
Pre-built connectors for various data sources
targetPeople: Non-technical users, businesses looking to scale data communication

faqs.question: What is Breadcrumb?
faqs.answer: Breadcrumb is an AI-powered end-to-end analytics platform designed to help non-technical users understand and communicate interactive insights.

faqs.question: What data sources can I connect with Breadcrumb?
faqs.answer: You can connect up to 3 sources (CSV, Excel) with the basic plan and up to 10 sources per space with the advanced plan. Pre-built connectors for HubSpot, Airtable, Square, and more are available on request.

faqs.question: What kind of support does Breadcrumb offer?
faqs.answer: Breadcrumb offers priority email and chat support with advanced plans.

faqs.question: Can I customize my dashboards with Breadcrumb?
faqs.answer: Yes, advanced dashboard customization is available with the advanced plan.

faqs.question: Does Breadcrumb offer AI-generated insights?
faqs.answer: Yes, Breadcrumb provides AI-generated dashboards and insight summaries.
